Name: Jungle Fire Sling
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale
Instructions: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger ale, stir and serve with straws.
Review: Hardly the most refined of drinks, but it does have the refreshing zing of ginger with a soupçon of sticky fruit, herbs and cognac in the background.
Nutrition: One serving of Jungle Fire Sling contains 258 calories
